title: MIPS Processor
description: This hardware model of a MIPS processor was created using VHDL. The project includes both a software and hardware pipelined version. The pipeline is 5 stages and uses data forwarding. The hardware pipeline includes static branch prediction with a max clock frequency of 44.48 MHz and a cycle time of 22.48 ns.

title: Crash Notification Helmet
description: The first component of the project was an Arduino Nano programmed with C++ to send data to a Flutter App. The data included the result of a basic crash detection algorithm which would trigger an SMS message sent to preset emergency contacts using the Twilio API.

title: IRobot Roomba
description: My team and I developed an embedded C program to blindly navigate a randomized course of obstacles using datasheet info. We also implemented a Python GUI used to visualize raw IR and Ping scan data from PuTTY while we navigated the course in under 20 minutes.

title: FitTrack
description: This fitness tracking app was created in Android Studio using Java. I was responsible for all of the profile and workout functionality. This included workout plans, sets/reps tracking, and exercise selection from exercise API.

title: Cookbook Web App
description: This cookbook application was created using the MERN stack. MongoDB, Express, React.JS, Node.JS. The app allows users to view, post, and edit the information for recipes including ingredients, instructions, and pictures.

title: Adoptm
description: The frontend for this pet adoption app was created in Android Studio using Java. The backend was created with Spring Boot in Java. The project group followed the SCRUM model with an issue board, sprints, and code reviews. GitLab CI/CD used for faster testing.

title: First Responder Drone
description: This is my senior deisgn project. The drone is designed to deliver a medical payload or collect on the scene information for First Responders. I worked on the embedded C for the flight control logic of the drone. I also worked on the C logic for the sensor package.
